name: Veg Steamed Momos
description: Soft steamed dumplings stuffed with a savory vegetable filling, served with spicy chili sauce.

name: Chicken Steamed Momos
description: Juicy steamed dumplings filled with minced chicken and herbs, paired with a spicy dipping sauce.

name: Fried Momos
description: Crispy fried dumplings with a choice of vegetable or chicken filling, served with chili sauce.

name: Tandoori Momos
description: Dumplings marinated in tandoori spices and grilled for a smoky, flavorful twist on a classic.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Pizza topped with a generous layer of pepperoni slices and mozzarella cheese.

name: Veggie Supreme Pizza
description: Loaded with bell peppers, onions, olives, and mushrooms on a cheesy base with tomato sauce.

name: Classic Chicken Burger
description: Grilled chicken patty with lettuce, tomato, and mayo in a soft burger bun.

name: Cheese Burger
description: A classic beef or chicken patty with melted cheese, lettuce, and a touch of ketchup.

name: Spicy Paneer Burger
description: Spicy grilled paneer with lettuce, tomato, and spicy mayo in a sesame bun.

name: Veg Spring Rolls
description: Crispy rolls filled with seasoned vegetables and served with a tangy dip.

name: Chicken Spring Rolls
description: Spring rolls stuffed with chicken and veggies, deep-fried to a golden crisp.

name: Hakka Noodles
description: Stir-fried noodles with vegetables, tossed in soy sauce and garlic for a classic flavor.

name: Schezwan Noodles
description: Spicy noodles tossed with mixed vegetables and a bold Schezwan sauce.

name: Chicken Chow Mein
description: Stir-fried noodles with tender chicken pieces and vegetables in a savory sauce.
